(-21 for losing) |c|☆Appelsap|gg |c|☆Appelsap|thank god for rillaboom ||Ladder isn't responding, score probably updated but might not have (Request timeout). |c|☆Appelsap|would never have broken your insane wall team otherwise |c|☆35Q71N|I think I should have attacked it with Miltank |c|☆Appelsap|and hope for the para |c|☆35Q71N|I thought about going for Toxic with Milotic, but it was too risky |c|☆35Q71N|I needed Milo for Naga |c|☆Appelsap|tough spot |c|☆35Q71N|In hindsight, I should have kept clicking Body Slam |c|☆35Q71N|And then max with Aromatisse |c|☆Appelsap|i would have done the same in your position |c|☆35Q71N|And Accelrock to finish it off |c|☆Appelsap|but prob not double into muds indeed |c|☆35Q71N|Well, that's a relief at least ahah |c|☆35Q71N|Yeah, I expected Airstream |c|☆Appelsap|well i thought that doesnt ko anyhow |c|☆35Q71N|I completely blanked out on the possibility of double sd |c|☆Appelsap|and i figured i'd blast through some mons and then dmax naga |c|☆Appelsap|but when you gave me the free +4 i figured o well here we go |c|☆35Q71N|Yeah... |c|☆35Q71N|Naganadel was so scary |c|☆Appelsap|max air on aroma was purely to outspeed milo and not get hazed |c|☆35Q71N|I even thought about maxing turn one |c|☆35Q71N|Yup, it was definitely the right move on your part |c|☆Appelsap|but it was specced naga, so milo walls it completely |c|☆35Q71N|Yes, but I didn't know that turn one |c|☆Appelsap|no ofc |c|☆35Q71N|If you were Nasty Plot + LO I was in big trouble |c|☆Appelsap|if i had np there it was prob gg turn 1 |c|☆35Q71N|Yeah, if you click Nasty Plot turn one I don't know what I could have done |c|☆Appelsap|but i didnt want to risk you predicting that and psychic fanging me turn 1 |c|☆Appelsap|so even with orb i prob would have meteored or doubled |c|☆35Q71N|And it makes a lot of sense |c|☆Appelsap|anyhow gg wp |c|☆35Q71N|u2 |l|☆Appelsap |c|☆35Q71N|Very well played
